scripts.test: jshint --verbose js js-nojquery && npm run -s test-eclint && npm run -s test-karma-jquery && npm run -s test-karma-nojquery && npm run -s test-dts
scripts.test-karma-jquery: cd js-test && webpack --define ASPNET_DATA_SCRIPT='../js/dx.aspnet.data.js' test.js test-bundle.js && karma start && karma start --bundled
scripts.test-karma-nojquery: cd js-test && webpack --define ASPNET_DATA_SCRIPT='../js-nojquery/index.js' test.js test-bundle.js && karma start --bundled
scripts.test-dts: cd js-test && tsc check-ts-compilation.ts && tsc check-ts-compilation.nojquery.ts
